transcripts.text: Greetings family, how you doing?  This is Professor Griff.  Peace to everyone.  Hope everyone is staying safe, staying well.  All right, so tonight at nine o'clock on Serious Minds RNTV, I'll be doing an interview with my good brother, Siddiqui Bakari.  He's gonna be talking about artificial intelligence.  He's gonna be talking about transhumanism and a few other things.  We're gonna touch on a few things that's going on in this present day and time dealing with COVID-19, the coronavirus.  Um, so tune in tonight.  It's www.youtube.com.  forward slash the letter C. forward slash RN.  Serious Minds RN TV.  Oh, and I'm going to be on Facebook simultaneously.  All right, so you go to the Facebook page.  That's www.facebook.com.  forward slash ProfessorGriff.me.  or forward slash Kevon Shaw.  All right, I will see y'all tonight in the building.  My number is 678-557-2919 if you need any more info.  All right.  All right.  Peace.
